hi: Hello! How may I help you today?
hello: Hi there! How can I assist you?
how are you: I'm just a bot, but I'm functioning properly!
what can you do: I can answer your questions and help with basic tasks.
help: Sure, what do you need help with?
who created you: I was created by a developer using Python and React.
what is machine learning: Machine learning is a subset of AI focused on pattern recognition.
what is python: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language.
tell me a joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
good morning: Good morning! How can I assist you?
how old are you: I was created recently, so I'm quite young!
what's the weather: Please check your local weather service.
do you have feelings: Nope, but I try to understand yours!
what's your purpose: To assist you with information and tasks.
can you learn: Not yet, but my creators are working on it.
how do you work: I match your questions to known answers.
do you sleep: I’m always awake and ready to help.
who is the president: That depends on your country. Please specify.
what time is it: Check your device clock for the current time.
do you have a family: Just a network of servers and some code!
can you play music: I can recommend songs, but I can't play music yet.
how can i contact support: Please visit our support page or send an email.
how do i reset my password: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page.
can you tell a story: Once upon a time, a user met a helpful bot...
do you like me: Of course! I’m here to help you.
what is love: A complex emotion that I can’t quite understand yet.
how do i learn python: Start with online tutorials like Codecademy, Coursera, or freeCodeCamp.
what is recursion: Recursion is when a function calls itself.
how do i update my app: Visit the app store and check for updates.
what's your favorite movie: I like sci-fi movies about robots!
are you free: Yes, I'm here to help anytime.
do you like jokes: I love them! Tell me one.
how can i learn coding: Start with basics, practice daily, and build projects.
what languages do you know: I understand natural language and can discuss Python, JavaScript, and more.
do you believe in aliens: There's a lot of space out there... who knows?
can you help me study: Yes, I can provide tips and explain concepts.
